remarks: Definition of a provable pre-statement, essentially just a reorganization of the arguments of df-mcls .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mppsval.p $e |- P = ( mPreSt ` T ) $.
mppsval.j $e |- J = ( mPPSt ` T ) $.
mppsval.c $e |- C = ( mCls ` T ) $.
elmpps $p |- ( <. D , H , A >. e. J <-> ( <. D , H , A >. e. P /\ A e. ( D C H ) ) ) $.
